name: Ludwig Leichhardt's Expedition
description:
A game about One of the Greatest Mysteries of Australia, Explorer Ludwig Leichhardt's Disappeareance!  WHAT IS THE GAME ABOUT

Ludwig Leichhardt, in full Friedrich Wilhelm Ludwig Leichhardt, (born Oct. 23, 1813, Trebatsch, Prussia—died after April 4, 1848, Australia), explorer and naturalist became one of Australia’s earliest heroes and whose mysterious disappearance aroused efforts to find him for nearly a century.

You get to play as Ludwig himself and follow his story througout the game~

This game was made for the Historically Accurate Game Jam~  FEATURES ⬥ Features:

⟡ A tabletop-like feel for this adventure game;

⟡ An interesting narrative, from Leichhardt's point of view!

⟡ Join Leichhardt into this Journey to learn more about his story.

CREDITS ⬥ Programming:   VaelicGames
